paragraphs.original: 话说薛蟠听见如此说了，气方渐平。三五日后，疼痛虽愈，伤痕未平，只装病在家，愧见亲友。展眼已到十月，因有各铺面夥计内有算年账要回家的，少不得家里治酒饯行。内有一个张德辉，自幼在薛蟠当铺内揽总，家内也有了二三千金的过活，今岁也要回家，明春方来。因说起：“今年纸札香料短少，明年必是贵的。明年先打发大小儿上来，当铺里照管，赶端阳前，我顺路就贩些纸札香扇来卖。除去关税花消，稍亦可以剩得几倍利息。”
paragraphs.english: Xue Pan heard these words and his mood gradually calmed down. A few days later, the pain subsided but the scars remained, and he had to stay home to feel ashamed of his friends and relatives. It was already October, and because some of the shopkeepers were returning home to calculate the year's accounts, they had to leave. One of them, Zhang Dihui, had been working as a manager in Xue Pan's pawnshop since he was young, with an annual income of several thousand silver dollars. This year, he was also returning home, and wouldn't be back until next year. He said, "This year, paper and incense are in short supply, and next year's prices will definitely be higher. Next year, I'll send my son to manage the pawnshop, and I'll take the opportunity to bring some paper and incense on my way back home. After deducting customs fees and other expenses, maybe I can make several times the interest."
paragraphs.chinese: 薛蟠听到这些话后，心情逐渐平静。三五天后，疼痛虽然愈合，但伤痕仍未平复，他只能装病在家，以愧对亲友。转眼间已是十月，因为铺面伙计中有人要回家计算年账，不得不出门饯行。其中一个张德辉，自幼在薛蟠的当铺内担任总管，家中也有二三千金的收入，今年也要回家，明年才会回来。他提到：“今年纸张香料短缺，明年价格肯定会更高。明年我会派大小儿来管理当铺，赶在端午节前，我会顺路贩些纸张和香扇来卖。除去关税和其他花销，或许可以赚得几倍的利息。”

paragraphs.original: 薛蟠听了，心下忖度：“如今我挨了打，正难见人，想著要躲避一年半截，又没处去躲，天天装病，也不是常法儿。况且我长了这么大，文不文，武不武，虽说做买卖，究竟戥子、算盘，从没拿过；地土风俗，远近道路，又不知道。不如也打点几个本钱，和张德辉逛一年来。赚钱也罢，不赚钱也罢，且躲躲羞去。二则逛逛山水，也是好的。”心内主意已定，至酒席散后，便和气平心，与张德辉说知，命他等一二日，一同前往。
paragraphs.english: Xue Pan listened and thought, "Now I have been beaten up, and it is hard for me to see anyone. I want to hide away for a year or so, but I have no place to go. Lying in bed sick is not a good way either. I am a grown man, but I do not know how to read or write, nor do I know how to use a scale or a balance. I do not know the customs or the roads here. It is better for me to take some capital and travel with Zhang Dihui for a year. Whether I make money or not, it will be good to get away from my shame. Besides, it will be nice to see the sights." After the banquet, he decided to be polite and agreeable to Zhang Dihui, and wait a couple of days to go with him.

paragraphs.original: 香菱向宝钗道：“我原要和太太说的，等大爷去了，我和姑娘做伴去。我又恐怕太太多心，说我贪著园里来玩，谁知你竟说了！”宝钗笑道：“我知道你心里羡慕这园子，不是一日两日的了，只是没有个空儿。每日来一趟，慌慌张张的，也没趣儿，所以趁著机会，越发住上一年，我也多个做伴的，你也遂了你的心。”香菱笑道：“好姑娘！趁著这个工夫，你教给我做诗罢！”宝钗笑道：“我说你‘得陇望蜀’呢。我劝你且缓一缓。今儿头一日进来，先出园东角门，从老太太起，各处各人，你都瞧瞧，问候一声儿，也不必特意告诉他们搬进园来。若有提起因由儿的，你只带口说我带了你进来做伴儿就完了。回来进了园，再到各姑娘房里走走。”
paragraphs.english: Xiangling said to Baoshui, "I wanted to tell my mother, but I thought she might think I was playing and want me to stay in the garden. I didn't expect you to agree!" Baoshui laughed and said, "I know you've been wanting to stay here for a long time, not just today. But I've never had the chance. Now you can come here once a day, but it's not very interesting. So take advantage of the opportunity and stay here for a year. I'll have someone to keep me company, and you'll be able to fulfill your wish." Xiangling laughed and said, "Good girl! Take advantage of this opportunity and teach me to write poems!" Baoshui laughed and said, "I've been telling you to 'get greedy and want more.' I don't want you to rush into writing poems. Today you just came into the garden, so go and greet everyone, starting from the old lady, and don't tell them you're moving in. If they ask, just say I'm here to keep you company. Then, when you come back into the garden, go and visit each girl's room."

paragraphs.english:
The moon hangs high in the sky,
Its cold light bright and clear,
Like a round mirror, it's so bright.
The poet likes to enjoy the moon,
But the wanderer is sad because of it.
The moon hangs over the jade tower,
Like a jade mirror, it's so bright.
The pearl curtains hang with ice disks,
The moonlight reflects the painted railings, so beautiful.
There's no need for silver candles,
The moonlight is already bright enough.
